title: Justice Department will disband its crypto-related enforcement team
summary: The Justice Department announced it will immediately disband its National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team, ending efforts to prosecute complex crypto-related crimes involving financial regulations
description: The Justice Department announced it will immediately disband its National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team, ending efforts to prosecute complex crypto-related crimes involving financial regulations
